definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: The selection for big seed of soybean could be creased oleic acid and decreased linolenic acid.
sentences.chinese: 大粒化选择可以提高油酸含量降低亚麻酸含量。

sentences.english: Pale yellow oily liquid, With linolenic acid-specific odor, Taste of soft.
sentences.chinese: 浅金黄油状流体，拥有亚麻酸特有的气息。

sentences.english: Soybeans with low linolenic acid content yield oil that does not require partial hydrogenation.
sentences.chinese: 低亚麻酸大豆在榨油过程中不需要部分氢化。

sentences.english: The soybeans yield oil with low linolenic content.
sentences.chinese: 大豆加工出的豆油含有较低比例的亚麻酸。

sentences.english: Lbotenic acid counteracts the effect of TPA on lipid peroxidation in mouse skin.
sentences.chinese: 亚麻酸抵消TPA对小鼠皮肤脂质过氧化的影响。

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1
duo1 yuan2 bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
